me thaththwaya pilibanda chinaye aakalpaya kumakda?shi්ra lanka aarthika wardhanaya , jathika ekamuthu bawa men ma samagi sampanna bawa pilibanda chinaya mitha්ra parshwika asalwasiyek lesa nirantharayen ma suparikshakari wanawa sema ewani karunu sambandhayen wana sanwardhana ki්rayadamayan pilibanda uthsahayanta shi්ra lanka rajayata sahaya da pala kara sitinawa.shi්ra lankawata itha ikmanin jathika samaya saha sthawarathwaya godananga gatha haki wana bawa china rajaye wishwasayayi.mewara olimpik ulela samanga chinayata erehiwa lokaye dawantha pa්racharaka wyaparayak diyath kara thibenawa.
me sabhawa amathu, as kan nasaya pilibanda shalya waidyawariyak wana sitha arambaepola, swakiya garhitha aathmaya niruwath kara ganimin me siddhiya itha ageta wiga්raha kalaya.
